select count(*) from pg_tables where tablename = '_general' and schemaname = '_global'
select nspname from pg_namespace where nspname = 'tester' limit 1;
select id from _roles where name = 'Admin' and password = '5f4dcc3b5aa765d61d8327deb882cf99' limit 1;
select nspname from pg_namespace where nspname = 'tester' limit 1;

select c.relname as name, obj_description(c.oid, 'pg_class') as description from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relkind in ('r','') and n.nspname = 'tester' and pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) and substr(c.relname,1,1) <> '_'  order by c.oid
select nspname from pg_namespace where nspname = 'tester' limit 1;
select nspname from pg_namespace where nspname = 'tester' limit 1;
select name, description from _views order by id
select nspname from pg_namespace where nspname = 'tester' limit 1;

select count(*) from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relkind in ('r','') and n.nspname = 'tester' and pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) and substr(c.relname,1,1) <> '_'

select c.oid from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relkind in ('r','') and n.nspname <> 'pg_catalog' and n.nspname !~ '^pg_toast' and pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) and substr(c.relname,1,1) <> '_' and c.relname = 'A' limit 1

create table "A" (id serial primary key  , "title" text ); grant select on table "A" to anonymous; comment on table "A" is 'A'; comment on column "A".id is 'ID';comment on column "A"."title" is 'title';
select nspname from pg_namespace where nspname = 'tester' limit 1;

select count(*) from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relkind in ('r','') and n.nspname = 'tester' and pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) and substr(c.relname,1,1) <> '_'

select c.oid from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relkind in ('r','') and n.nspname <> 'pg_catalog' and n.nspname !~ '^pg_toast' and pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) and substr(c.relname,1,1) <> '_' and c.relname = 'B' limit 1

create table "B" (id serial primary key  , "body" text  , "a" integer ); grant select on table "B" to anonymous; comment on table "B" is 'B'; comment on column "B".id is 'ID';comment on column "B"."body" is 'body';comment on column "B"."a" is 'a';
select nspname from pg_namespace where nspname = 'tester' limit 1;
select id from _views where name = 'View' limit 1;

select c.oid from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relkind in ('r','') and n.nspname <> 'pg_catalog' and n.nspname !~ '^pg_toast' and pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) and substr(c.relname,1,1) <> '_' and c.relname = 'A' limit 1

select c.oid from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relkind in ('r','') and n.nspname <> 'pg_catalog' and n.nspname !~ '^pg_toast' and pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) and substr(c.relname,1,1) <> '_' and c.relname = 'B' limit 1
insert into _views (name, definition, description) values('View', 'select * from A, B where A.id = B.a order by A.title', NULL)
select nspname from pg_namespace where nspname = 'tester' limit 1;
select id from _views where name = 'View' limit 1;
select nspname from pg_namespace where nspname = 'tester' limit 1;
select id from _views where name = 'View1' limit 1;

select c.oid from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relkind in ('r','') and n.nspname <> 'pg_catalog' and n.nspname !~ '^pg_toast' and pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) and substr(c.relname,1,1) <> '_' and c.relname = 'B' limit 1
